name: ARGO - Social Video Chat
description: Explore the world with ARGO~ ARGO connects you with people across the world. You can easily make a lot of friends with different and variety of languages and culture.   Send automated translation messages to friends~ ARGO provides automatic translation of every languages. You can now send and receive unlimited messages with foreign friends even if you dont know any foreign language.   Main features - Discover or find friends across the world through video chats - ARGO supports over 21 different languages.  - Unlimited messaging among friends - Automatic text message translation during messaging - Quick connection to friends through Direct Video Call - Select Preferences in Gender, Age and Region   Security (management) policy ARGO aims for a wholesome culture exchange between and among members. Any violation against our policies will be taken seriously and will lead to account suspension.  ARGO emphasizes users privacy. ARGO treats all user information with strict confidentiality, and is never shared to any third parties. Specific location is never shared and is not controlled by your devices location settings.  Remember, any information you share with your friends through ARGO is your responsibility. Even though ARGO does not save any video chat or screenshot, ARGO has no control of outside-app in the users device.   Additional Information Please learn more at http://www.argozone.com Like us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/argo.application If you need help or have suggestions, please contact us at help@argozone.com Operator data charges may apply. ARGO recommend using an unlimited data plan or Wi-fi connection.   About Permissions : - Camera : It is used to send video from camera to the other in the video call. - Microphone : It is used to transmit voice from the microphone in the video call. - Storage : It is used to send or download a photo in the chat room - Phone status : It is used to stop or resume video call upon the phone status.
